dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Ah, a wandering samurai... You don't see many of your kind anymore. What brings you here?

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: This town was once a thriving haven for travelers. Merchants, monks, warriors... all passed through. But one night, shadows came from the woods, and everything changed.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: No one knows what they were—spirits, cursed souls, maybe worse. Those who fought them vanished. Now only echoes remain, and a tavern barely standing.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Safe? Hah... Not really. One of the creatures still lingers nearby—by the old tavern ruins. Kill it, and maybe this place will sleep again.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: If you're heading to the tavern ruins, be careful. The creature is not always in our world—it hides in the spirit world.

choices.text: How do I reach the spirit world?

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Use the 'T' key to shift between this world and the spirit world. But beware... the shift is not just visual—some things live only there.

choices.text: Understood. Why is the creature attacking the tavern?

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: At night, the barrier weakens. The creature slips through, haunting the tavern ruins. That’s why it must be destroyed—fully, in the spirit world.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Good luck, Samurai. Help me put this place to rest, and I’ll reward you with a healing potion.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Very well. May your blade stay sharp, Samurai.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: You've done it... The town is at peace again. I can't thank you enough.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Here, as promised. May this potion serve you well.

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Still wandering around? You really like it here, huh?

dialogues.name: Panda
dialogues.text: Well, you're always welcome to chat. I’ve got plenty of ghost stories.
